channel.title: Stepping Up As Prince Mid/Late Game is not necessarily bad
channel.description: People seem to think that stepping up as Prince is somehow a universally bad strategy. But in some situations it's optimal play, even mid-game. For example, if there are 3 evils and u elect EK over Prince with only 7 people alive ... Think about it. You lost :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: Stepping Up As Prince Mid/Late Game is not necessarily bad

item.description:
I normally step up if I used all my executes or execute a scummy Bd
